description: This Kotlin source file defines a RecyclerView Adapter called LogsAdapter used for displaying log entries in a user interface. It handles diffing of log items and binds log data to views within a RecyclerView.

classes.name: LogsAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying log entries with differential updates.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Object implementing diffing logic for LogEntry items to optimize RecyclerView updates.

methods.name: VH
methods.description: ViewHolder class holding references to the log entry item views.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates the view holder for a log entry.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a LogEntry item to the ViewHolder views.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Defines how to determine if items or their contents are the same for RecyclerView updates.

methods.name: VH
methods.description: Initializes views for each log entry item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates ViewHolder instances.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds log entry data to the ViewHolder views.
